quoteText:
In addition, we may collect information about your location if you have instructed your Device to send such information to the Application via the privacy settings on that Device, or if you have uploaded photos tagged with location information.
We may use the location information collected from your Device or photos to enhance your use of the Application by providing you with relevant content and contextual advertising.
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
